title: Discovery of potent and selective activity-based probes (ABPs) for the deubiquitinating enzyme USP30
content:
RSC Chem. Biol., 2024, Advance Article

Milon Mondal, Fangyuan Cao, Daniel Conole, Holger W. Auner, Edward W. Tate
IMP-2586 and IMP-2587 are selective and potent small molecule USP30 activity-based probes that engage USP30 rapidly in intact cells.
